meanings.definition: A type of winter sports equipment used for skiing.
meanings.sent1: I rented skibobs to go skiing on the snowy mountain.
meanings.sent2: The skibobs were neatly lined up outside the ski lodge.
meanings.sent3: The skibobs looked like colorful rockets ready to blast off down the slope.
meanings.sent4: Her skibobs were like magic carpets gliding effortlessly on the snow.
meanings.sent5: The skibobs made skiing feel like flying through a winter wonderland.

meanings.definition: A person who participates in the sport of skibobbing.
meanings.sent1: The skibobs cheered as they raced down the hill.
meanings.sent2: She is a skilled skibobs who has won many competitions.
meanings.sent3: The skibobs shared funny stories about their skiing adventures.
meanings.sent4: He was a fearless skibobs, conquering every slope with ease.
meanings.sent5: The skibobs inspired others to join the exciting world of skibobbing.
